org.onehippo.forge.resetpassword.frontend

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.resetpassword.frontend.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Configuration class obtaining all configurable labels, url validity and password duration. For labels use LabelMap, for url validity and password duration use DurationsMap. To obtain a specific value, use the publicly available keys in this class. final Configuration configuration = new Configuration(node); final Map labelMap = configuration.getLabelMap(); final String emailTextReset = labelMap.get(Configuration.EMAIL_TEXT_RESET);
